name: Fleur MCP
title: fleurmcp.com
shortDescription: Fleur MCP serves as a dedicated app store for the Claude Desktop app, allowing users to seamlessly integrate various software tools without leaving their workspace. It is designed primarily for users who rely on Claude for their daily operations, offering a streamlined method to enhance functionality. An example use case includes a developer integrating project management tools directly into Claude to manage tasks more efficiently.
cons: May have a limited app selection
Dependent on the Claude Desktop app
